title: Episode 11: Actually, Life is Pretty Awesome
itunes:title: Episode 11: Actually, Life is Pretty Awesome
description: This week, James and Antony take a brief departure from talking about the growing national debt, and our absurd tax system to discuss the numerous ways in which more economic and personal freedom has made people wealthier, more equal, and better off all over the world. We're actually living in pretty amazing times.

We're actually living in pretty amazing times.
